metadata.title: Oscar Oceguera - Full Stack JavaScript Developer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Oscar Eduardo Oceguera Bibriesca, a Full Stack JavaScript Developer with 8+ years of experience specializing in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. Software Engineer at Clip, JSConf México Organizer, and EventLoop Mexico Co-Organizer.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Full Stack JavaScript Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications that impact thousands of users. As a team builder who enjoys challenges, I believe in the power of collaboration and knowledge sharing to create user-centric solutions that enhance efficiency.
about.paragraph2: Currently working as a Software Engineer at Clip, a leading Mexican fintech platform, I bring perseverance, capability, and innovation to every project. I emphasize attention to detail in UI design and believe in building applications that facilitate people's work and performance.
about.communityValue: JSConf México Organizer (2023-Present) • EventLoop Mexico Co-Organizer • Hackademy Mentor

jobs.description: Leading frontend development initiatives at Mexico's leading fintech platform, building scalable payment solutions that serve thousands of merchants nationwide. Architecting and implementing modern web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
achievements: Architected and developed core payment platform features processing millions in transactions
Implemented microfrontend architecture reducing deployment time by 40%
Led migration from legacy codebase to modern React/Next.js stack
Established testing standards achieving 85%+ code coverage with Jest and React Testing Library
Mentored team of 5+ junior developers and conducted comprehensive code reviews
Collaborated with product, design, and backend teams to deliver user-centric solutions

jobs.description: Developed enterprise web applications and REST APIs for various clients across fintech, e-commerce, and SaaS sectors. Specialized in JavaScript full-stack development with React, Node.js, and GraphQL.
achievements: Built and deployed 10+ production applications serving 50,000+ users
Implemented GraphQL APIs reducing data over-fetching by 60%
Designed and developed microservices architecture with Node.js and Express
Integrated payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) for e-commerce platforms
Reduced application load time by 50% through performance optimization
Led technical planning and sprint retrospectives for agile teams

jobs.description: Developed responsive web applications and RESTful APIs using modern JavaScript frameworks. Focused on creating intuitive user interfaces and scalable backend services.
achievements: Developed 15+ web applications using React, Angular, and Vue.js
Built RESTful APIs with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Implemented responsive designs achieving 95%+ mobile compatibility scores
Collaborated with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces
Integrated third-party APIs and services (Google Maps, Firebase, AWS)
Participated in code reviews and pair programming sessions

jobs.description: Started professional career building websites and web applications. Gained foundational experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend technologies.
achievements: Developed 20+ websites for small businesses and startups
Learned and applied JavaScript frameworks (jQuery, AngularJS)
Implemented responsive designs using Bootstrap and CSS3
Managed WordPress installations and custom theme development
Worked with MySQL databases and PHP backend development
Provided technical support and website maintenance for clients
